basic_information.scholarship_name: Insurance and Risk Management Endowed Scholarship

description: The Insurance and Risk Management Leadership Scholarship is open to full-time undergraduate students. Students must have a declared major in Insurance & Risk Management, a declared minor in Insurance, or a declared minor in Risk Management. Preferred Actuary, Insurance and Risk Management Club member, or student involved in other university-related student leadership activities. Eligibility Requirements Declared Insurance & Risk Management major, a declared minor in Insurance, or a declared minor in Risk Management Full-time undergraduate Selection Process Preferred Actuary, Insurance and Risk Management Club member, or student involved in other university-related student leadership activities
